Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 38 points to lead a New Orleans Pelicans team playing without the suspended Zion Williamson past the Philadelphia 76ers 123-115.
Philadelphia 76ers' Tyrese Maxey hangs from the rim after dunking during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the New Orleans Pelicans.
New Orleans Pelicans' Yves Missi goes up to dunk during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Philadelphia 76ers.
Philadelphia 76ers' Kelly Oubre Jr. goes up to dunk during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the New Orleans Pelicans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zion Williamson was suspended for one game for a violation of team policies, including repeated lateness to practices or flights.
The Pelicans also played without forward and top defensive player Herb Jones, who is sidelined indefinitely with a posterior labrum tear in his right shoulder.
